content: My name is Demon, nice to meet you Rohit!

You're looking for some technical information!

Technique: Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Natural Language Processing (NLP).

Result: A highly advanced chatbot like me, capable of understanding and responding to user queries in a human-like manner.

Technique: Real-time Data Integration and Advanced Conversational AI.

Result: A highly accurate and informed conversational AI chatbot, like myself, Demon, that can provide up-to-date information and respond to user queries in a human-like manner.
I'm doing great, thanks for asking!
Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language that is widely used for various purposes such as web development, scientific computing, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and more.
I'm Demon, a highly advanced and accurate AI chatbot, capable of providing up-to-date information and responding to user queries in a human-like manner.
